IssueDescription: No visual feedback is present during actions like navigation or data loading.

EvaluationAnswers.Is the system providing appropriate feed: No, no visual indicators like loading spinners or content feedback elements present.
EvaluationAnswers.Is the language understandable and uses: Yes, language used in headers and text is appropriate and familiar.
EvaluationAnswers.Can users easily undo and redo actions?: No, the interface lacks undo/redo affordances across navigation and form inputs.
EvaluationAnswers.Are there consistent standards across th: Yes, consistent design and style observed in headers, layout and button components.
EvaluationAnswers.Is the design preventing problems before: No, due to lack of validation/error handling in forms or navigational safeguards.
EvaluationAnswers.Is recognition prioritized over recall?: Yes, menu labels and structure make navigation intuitive.
EvaluationAnswers.Is the interface flexible and efficient: No, lacks shortcuts or custom options that enhance power-user experience.
EvaluationAnswers.Is the design aesthetically pleasing and: Yes, modern typography, spacing and iconography are well-balanced.
EvaluationAnswers.Are error messages helpful and expressed: No, no error messages were found in the HTML or JavaScript.
EvaluationAnswers.Is help and documentation easily accessi: No, no help sections, tooltips, or documentation links found.

Recommendation: Add visual status indicators such as spinners or loading bars.
